code-table.name: app-classifier-code
code-table.description: A way to classify applications. Each XRX application may have one to many classifiers.

item.label: Dashboard
item.definition: Applications that manage the display of tables, charts, graphs and other tools to allow the management of digital dashboards.

item.label: Library
item.definition: Media collection management like books, articles, blogs, newspapers.

item.label: Security
item.definition: Applications that manage user authentication, user authorization, encription and auditing.

item.label: Semantic Web
item.definition: Applications that manage semantic web data.

item.label: TEI
item.definition: Applications that manage user authentication, user authorization, encription and auditing.

item.label: Software Development Lifecycle
item.definition: Applications that manage the software development process.

item.label: Training
item.definition: Applications that can be used to teach XRX or manage the training process.
